headline: We are looking for passionate gambers to give feedback us to provide better service to fellow lovers of the game.
body:
You will be exploring new version and perhaps even getting free credits while you are at it!

We will be compensating each user with a $75 prefunded to your account.

meta.title: El Bet Casino Customer Experience Study
meta.description: We are looking for passionate gambers to give feedback us to provide better service to fellow lovers of the game.
